name: SpanishCounter
0:
”Alexa, open Spanish Counter.”
”Alexa, launch Spanish Counter.”
”Alexa, ask Spanish Counter to count to 100.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spanish counter
des:
You can use Spanish Counter to have Alexa count for you in Spanish!

After you launch the skill, Alexa will ask you to provide a number. Alexa will count up to the number in Spanish.

You should provide your number in English. The maximum number accepted is 1,000.

To begin, say, "Alexa, launch Spanish Counter!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
